meanings.definition: The act or process of growing upward.
meanings.sent1: The upgrowth of the tree reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: The vine's upgrowth was impressive as it climbed the trellis.
meanings.sent3: The upgrowth of the beanstalk made Jack's adventure even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was an upgrowth, reaching new heights every day.
meanings.sent5: The upgrowth of the sunflowers painted a beautiful picture in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins revealed an upgrowth of ivy covering the walls.
meanings.sent2: The upgrowth of the mountain was visible from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The upgrowth of the cake in the oven surprised the baker.
meanings.sent4: His upgrowth in knowledge was evident from his insightful questions.
meanings.sent5: The upgrowth of the city skyline was a sight to behold at sunset.
